product_name: SmartWool Microweight Boxer Briefs - Wool - Men's
long_description: The SmartWool Microweight Boxer briefs for men offer an easy fit and high comfort in warm or cool weather. Jersey-knit, fine merino wool helps maintain a comfortable temperature whether the day is hot, cold or in between. SmartWool items are guaranteed not to itch and can be repeatedly washed and dried without shrinking. Covered elastic waistband prevents chafing; chafe-free flatlock seams increase comfort. Briefs feature a traditional front fly and a natural rise. The SmartWool Microweight Boxer briefs feature easy care: machine wash and dry on cool temperature setting.
short_description: The SmartWool Microweight Boxer briefs for men offer an easy fit and high comfort in warm or cool weather.
